column4: does the installer kernel detects your drive ? (use dmesg to check)
it detects it but just wants to wipe it clean
the shiped OO has already the patches from ximian, for the fonts i dunno
think ximian will continue to release patches now that they are part of novell?
yep, the OOO licence force them to, and dont forget that ximian guys are goooood guys :)
i need piix kernel support to be built into kernel and not as module, will that mess up ide_core, libata and the like modules?
i realle dunno about the piix support, sorry
logically speaking though, as long as the support is there in the kernel, built in or not, then corresponding modules should load right?  or just build all associated into kernel maybe...
yes, that's what i was looking for, thanks, and thanks thoreauputic
np, dont forget to share your OOO bianries ;)
will do, will do :)
i have new industrial theme, courtesy of another #ubuntu user, if you like
what has changed in industrial ?
well, a few things, an overhaul i guess, icons...titlebar color, slight change in border color
is it still so bright ?
the borders are a little darker, titlebar is a little darker, icons lighter maybe? one sec i'll put up a screenshot
http://uclinux.info/lance/ubuntu/ubuntu_images/new_industrial.png <-new ximian industrial theme (Industrial-Steel) ?
really subtle changes , but i sure like the new icons theme :)
you too :)
i dunno in this particular case but ./ is the cwd (current working directory) but maybe here the ./ is relative to a debian specific path wich may have the value of "/"
